projectAuthor: Philippine Science High School Main Campus

content.title: Description
content.text: Use the accelerometer to determine how level a surface really is. This is also a good place to discuss the limitations of an accelerometer with regards to rotational information.

content.title: Materials
text: Intel Galileo Board with accelerometer module
Long, rigid, insulated material (e.g. thick wooden ruler) for mounting the accelerometer module
Various work areas and surfaces to test

content.title: Author
content.text: Jason Alcarez, Kelvin Bartilad, Ralph Benedict Bucao
